alert.note: Alert for Bordeaux, Chugwater, Wheatland; Central and West Carbon; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Foothills and High Plains; Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; North Laramie Range and Adjacent High Plains; North Laramie Valley, Shirley Basin; North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range, Medicine Bow NF; Snowy Range, Medicine Bow NF; Southern Laramie Range; Southern Laramie Valley; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 08 at 6:35PM MDT until September 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR ALL OF SOUTHEAST WYOMING... The surface cold front has pushed through the area or will shortly late this evening. Therefore, will let the Red Flag Warning expire on time.
